short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you read news online, know what you're reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surfy provides you with information about the political leanings and factuality of new sites, so you can beat false news. Learn more at https://getsurfy.org!

New in Version 1.0.5, the extension's icon now changes its color based on the current site.

Coming soon: 1) Enhanced Twitter and Facebook functionality -- Surfy will add a small indicator to social media links so you can know what you're looking at without clicking through to individual articles. 2) Article-level fact-checks -- Surfy will automatically compare article titles to existing fact-checks; when a confident match is found, Surfy will provide a link to the relevant fact-checking article.
